channel.title: zinc on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in zinc on funPlantGenes

item.title: ASPR2;OsTPR2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g14980 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0254700 Gene Symbol: ASPR2 OsTPR2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: BjCET1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BjCET1 Gene Name: cation-efflux transporter 1 Genome: Species: Brassica juncea Functional Descriptions: BjCET1 contains 382 amino acid residues, including a signature motif of the cation diffusion facilitator protein family, six classic trans-membrane-spanning structures and a cation-efflux domain.

item.title: BohLOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BohLOL1 Gene Name: LSD-one-like 1 Genome: Species: Bambusa oldhamii Functional Descriptions: A cDNA, BohLOL1, encoding a protein containing three zf-LSD1 (zinc finger-Lesions Simulating Disease resistance 1) domains was cloned from growing bamboo (Bambusa oldhamii) shoots.

item.title: BSR-D1;ZFP36
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g32230 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0437200 Gene Symbol: BSR-D1 ZFP36 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CaC3H14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaC3H14 Gene Name: zinc finger CCCH domain-containing protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaC3H14 encoding a tandem CCCH zinc finger protein is directly targeted by CaWRKY40 and positively regulates the response of pepper to inoculation by Ralstonia solanacearum.

item.title: CaPIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIF1 Gene Name: Pathogen-Induced Factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A plant EPF-type zinc-finger protein, CaPIF1, involved in defence against pathogens.

item.title: CcLOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA00g77830 Gene Symbol: CcLOL1 Gene Name: LSD ONE LIKE1 Genome: Species: Capsicum chinense Functional Descriptions: CcLOL1, CaGLK2 and CcAPRR2 are highly diverged and are associated with immature fruit color variation in C.

item.title: CitSUS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSUS5 Gene Name: sucrose synthase 5 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitSWEET6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitSWEET6 Gene Name: sugars will eventually be exported transporter 6 Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: Expression analyses and functional characterizations of CitSUS5 and CitSWEET6 support their proposed role in regulating fructose and glucose levels, hexose to sucrose ratio, and sucrose synthase cleavage activity.

item.title: CitZAT5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CitZAT5 Gene Name: ZINC FINGER OF ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA Genome: Citrus Genome Database Species: Citrus reticulata Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor CitZAT5 modifies sugar accumulation and hexose proportion in citrus fruit.

item.title: ClWIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla008537 Gene Symbol: ClWIP1 Gene Name: C2H2 zinc finger transcription factor Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: A putative C2H2 zinc finger transcription factor gene, ClWIP1 (gene ID Cla008537), an orthologue of the melon gynoecy gene CmWIP1, was disrupted.

item.title: CmANR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmANR1 Gene Name: MADS-box TF Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CmBT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Identified bric-a-brac, tramtrack and broad (BTB) and transcription adapter putative zinc finger (TAZ) domain protein CmBT1 as the interacting partner of CmANR1 through a yeast-two-hybrid (Y2H) screening library.

item.title: CmMAF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cluster-17868.118397 Gene Symbol: CmMAF2 Gene Name: AFFECTING FLOWERING 2 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Chrysanthemum MAF2 regulates flowering by repressing gibberellin biosynthesis in response to low temperature.

item.title: CsLOB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsLOB1 Gene Name: Lateral organ boundaries 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: PthA, a transcriptional activator-like (TAL) effector, directs the expression of the canker susceptibility gene CsLOB1.

item.title: CsSEF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsSEF1 Gene Name: putative CCCH-type zinc finger protein Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Expression of CsSEF1 gene encoding putative CCCH zinc finger protein is induced by defoliation and prolonged darkness in cucumber fruit.

item.title: CsTu
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa016861 Gene Symbol: CsTu Gene Name: Tuberculate fruit Genome: cucumber genome sequence (http://cuke.

item.title: CsZFP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_5g028870 Gene Symbol: CsZFP6 Gene Name: Genome: CuGenDB Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber glossy fruit 1 (CsGLF1) encodes the zinc finger protein 6 (CsZFP6) that regulates fruit glossiness by enhancing cuticular wax biosynthesis.

item.title: DCM1;SAW1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g43120 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0638000 Gene Symbol: DCM1 SAW1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: DST;WL1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g57240 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0786400 Gene Symbol: DST WL1 HST1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: Du13;TL1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g48530 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0698859 Gene Symbol: Du13 TL1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FaBRIZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: maker-Fvb6-2-augustus-gene-66.20 Gene Symbol: FaBRIZ Gene Name: RING-type E3 ligase Genome: Camarosa Genome Assembly v1.

item.title: GhZFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhZFP1 Gene Name: CCCH-type zinc finger protein 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhZFP1, a novel CCCH-type zinc finger protein from cotton, enhances salt stress tolerance and fungal disease resistance in transgenic tobacco by interacting with GZIRD21A and GZIPR5.

item.title: GmPLATZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G147800 Gene Symbol: GmPLATZ Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Global analysis of seed transcriptomes reveals a novel PLATZ regulator for seed size and weight control in soybean.

item.title: GmSAP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmSAP5 Gene Name: Stress-associated proteins Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSAP5, a soybean A20/AN1 domain-containing stress-associated protein gene activated by GmAREB3, increases drought stress resistance in soybean by mediating ABA signaling.

item.title: GmZF351
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.06g290100 Gene Symbol: GmZF351 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Zinc-finger protein GmZF351 improves both salt and drought stress tolerance in soybean.

item.title: GmZF392
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G205700 Gene Symbol: GmZF392 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmZF392, a tandem CCCH zinc finger (TZF) protein which was identified in our previous RNA-seq analysis of seed-preferred transcription factors, was found to function as a positive regulator of lipid production.

item.title: Gpc-B1;NAM-B1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS6B02G207500LC Gene Symbol: Gpc-B1 NAM-B1 Gene Name: Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: HvMTP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvMTP1 Gene Name: Putative Zn transporter 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: We identified a novel cereal member of CDFs in barley, termed HvMTP1, that localizes to the vacuolar membrane.

item.title: HvZIP7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvZIP7 Gene Name: zinc transporter protein ZIP7 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: HvZIP7 mediates zinc accumulation in barley (Hordeum vulgare) at moderately high zinc supply.

item.title: MdDof54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000308863 Gene Symbol: MdDof54 Gene Name: DNA-binding one zinc-finger 5 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The apple DNA-binding one zinc-finger protein MdDof54 promotes drought resistance.

item.title: MdMIEL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMIEL1 Gene Name: MYB30-INTERACTING E3 LIGASE 1 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdZAT10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000198015 Gene Symbol: MdZAT10 Gene Name: C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The apple C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor MdZAT10 positively regulates JA-induced leaf senescence by interacting with MdBT2.

item.title: MsLEA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MS.gene058705 Gene Symbol: MsLEA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: These results indicate that MsLEA1 recruits and protects its target proteins (SOD and Ms1770) and increases alfalfa tolerance against drought and Al stresses.

item.title: MtYSL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Medtr3g092090 Gene Symbol: MtYSL3 Gene Name: Medicago truncatula Yellow Stripe1-Like3 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: MtYSL3 is a plasma membrane protein expressed by vascular cells in roots and nodules and by cortical nodule cells.

item.title: MtZPT2-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MTR_1g106730 Gene Symbol: MtZPT2-2 Gene Name: C2H2 type ZFP Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: The objectives of this study were to investigate the role of MtZPT2-2 from R108 in regulating salt tolerance using overexpressing lines and gene-edited mutants and the underlying mechanisms.

item.title: PeSTZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PeSTZ1 Gene Name: SALT TOLERANCE ZINC FINGER 1 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: PeSTZ1, a C2H2-type zinc finger transcription factor from Populus euphratica, enhances freezing tolerance through modulation of ROS scavenging by directly regulating PeAPX2.
